subject: Soccer
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: Pirlo, a 36-year-old midfielder, will join David Villa and Frank Lampard in giving New York City F.C. a load of both star power and international experience.
snippet: Pirlo, a 36-year-old midfielder, will join David Villa and Frank Lampard in giving New York City F.C. a load of both star power and international experience.
